description: Hibs to assess loan keeper - gossip
title: Hibs to assess loan keeper
title_page: Hibs to assess loan keeper - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Lee Johnson says Hibernian will attempt to bring in a goalkeeper on an emergency loan before their Premiership opener against St Mirren on Sunday after David Marshall and Jojo Wollacott both picked up injuries. (The Herald)
Read the rest of Friday's Scottish gossip.
